questionSet.question: What is a software?

options.value: A set of instructions for your computer

questionSet.rightAnswer: A set of instructions for your computer

questionSet.question: When your teacher asks a question in the class, you simply raise your hand if you know the answer. It is your brain that prompts you to raise the hand or you can say, it gives you instructions to react like this. Similarly, a computer gets all the instructions from the ____________ to perform various tasks.
What do application programs do?

options.value: Enable the RAM to load information.
Enable the user to perform a task.
Enable the BIOS instructions to load on hard disk.

questionSet.rightAnswer: Enable the user to perform a task.

questionSet.question: Which of the following is a file management software in Windows 7?
Which of the following software is used to play music on Windows?
